action_schema.input: {"title":"XML to JSON converter","type":"object","properties":{"xmldata":{"type":"string","title":"XML Data","format":"textarea","minLength":1,"propertyOrder":1},"attrkey":{"type":"string","title":"Attribute Key","default":"$","description":"Prefix that is used to access the attributes","propertyOrder":2},"ignoreAttrs":{"type":"boolean","title":"Ignore Attributes","enum":[false,true],"default":true,"description":"Ignore all XML attributes and only create text nodes","propertyOrder":3},"mergeAttrs":{"type":"boolean","title":"Merge Attributes","enum":[false,true],"default":false,"description":"Merge attributes and child elements as properties of the parent, instead of keying attributes off a child attribute object. This option is ignored if Ignore Attributes is false","propertyOrder":4},"explicitArray":{"type":"boolean","title":"Explicit Array","enum":[false,true],"default":false,"description":"Always put child nodes in an array if true; otherwise an array is created only if there is more than one","propertyOrder":5},"normalizeTags":{"type":"boolean","title":"Normalize Tags","enum":[false,true],"default":true,"description":"Normalize all tag names to lowercase","propertyOrder":6},"normalize":{"type":"boolean","title":"Trim Whitespace","enum":[false,true],"default":false,"description":"Trim whitespaces inside text nodes","propertyOrder":7},"stripPrefix":{"type":"boolean","title":"Strip Namespace Prefix","enum":[true,false],"default":true,"description":"Strips the xml namespace prefix. E.g '<foo:Bar/>' will become 'Bar'. (Note: the xmlns prefix is NOT stripped.)","propertyOrder":8},"parseNumbers":{"type":"boolean","title":"Parse Numbers","enum":[false,true],"default":false,"description":"Parses integer-like strings as integers and float-like strings as floats E.g. '0' becomes 0 and '15.56' becomes 15.56","propertyOrder":9},"parseBooleans":{"type":"boolean","title":"Parse Booleans","enum":[false,true],"default":false,"description":"Parses boolean-like strings to booleans E.g. 'true' becomes true and 'False' becomes false","propertyOrder":10},"strict":{"type":"boolean","title":"Strict Parse","enum":[true,false],"default":false,"description":"Set sax-js to strict or non-strict parsing mode. Defaults to true which is highly recommended, since parsing HTML which is not well-formed XML might yield just about anything","propertyOrder":11}}}
action_schema.name: devtools-xml2json-convert

action_data.xmldata:
<?xml version = "1.0" encoding = "utf-8"?>

<!-- planes.xml - A document that lists ads for 
                  used airplanes -->

<!DOCTYPE planes_for_sale SYSTEM "planes.dtd">
<planes_for_sale>
   <ad>
      <year> 1977 </year>
      <make> &c; </make>
      <model> Skyhawk </model>
      <color> Light blue and white </color>
      <description> New paint, nearly new interior,
            685 hours SMOH, full IFR King avionics </description>
      <price> 23,495 </price>
      <seller phone = "555-222-3333"> Skyway Aircraft </seller>
      <location>
         <city> Rapid City, </city>
         <state> South Dakota </state>
      </location>
   </ad>
   <ad>
      <year> 1965 </year>
      <make> &p; </make>
      <model> Cherokee </model>
      <color> Gold </color>
      <description> 240 hours SMOH, dual NAVCOMs, DME, 
                new Cleveland brakes, great shape </description>
      <seller phone = "555-333-2222"  
              email = "jseller@www.axl.com">
              John Seller </seller>
      <location>
         <city> St. Joseph, </city>
         <state> Missouri </state>
      </location>
   </ad>
</planes_for_sale>
